summary: The 'Advancing Lifesaving Efforts with Rapid Test strips for Communities Act' (ALERT Communities Act) aims to address the opioid crisis. The bill mandates research on fentanyl and xylazine test strips, authorizes grant funds for their use, and requires first responder training on these strips. It also directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop research and marketing frameworks for test strip technology and conduct a study on the impact of their availability and usage.
